thread.section_title: Hotel Basss by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel in lively, cosy area
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in lively, cosy area - Review of Hotel Basss by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WillemJB
title: Nice hotel in lively, cosy area
text:
Rooms are nice, breakfast can be better (no great coffee). Nice is the coffee avaialbility in the afternoon.
DOwnside is that prices seem to have gone up in the last year. Last year it was more affordable than recently.
Room Tip: ask for room in the back if you want a quiet room. See more room tips
